Can you explain why red giants are so large?
Plan: 1) Search for the reason why red giants are large. 2) Return the explanation.
Searching for why red giants are large.
Red giants are large because they have exhausted the hydrogen in their cores, causing the core to contract and heat up, while the outer layers expand.
